resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76259</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>419e7022-0e7c-4c2d-bf5b-266759b7b560#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Gay-Lussac törvényei</string>
            <string language="en">Rules of Gay-Lussac </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtlinien von Homosexuellem-Lussac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règles de Gai-Lussac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Réguas de gay-Lussac-Lussac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regole di gay-lussac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κανόνες gay-Lussac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reglas de gay-lussac</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A gázok hőtágulása, az abszolút hőmérsékleti skála, Gay-Lussac első és második törvényének kimondása</string>
            <string language="en">Heat expansion of gases, the absolute temperature scale, Gay-Lussac's 1st and 2nd rule</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Gay-Lussac első törvénye,  Gay-Lussac második törvénye,  </string>
            <string language="en">Gay-Lussac's 1st rule,  Gay-Lussac's 2nd rule,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhitzen Sie Expansion der Gase, der 
Kelvin-Skala, der Homosexuellen-Lussac's 1. und 2. Richtlinie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffez l'expansion des gaz, de l'échelle de 
température absolue, de la 1ère et 2ème règle Gaie-Lussac's</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqueça a expansão dos gáses, da escala de 
temperatura absoluta, da 1a e à régua gay-Lussac's-Lussac's</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riscaldi l'espansione dei gas, della scala di 
temperatura assoluta, della regola di gay-lussac's primo e 
secondo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση θερμότητας των αερίων, της κλίμακας απόλυτης
θερμοκρασίας, του gay-Lussac 1$ου και 2$ου κανόνα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caliente la extensión de los gases, de la escala 
de temperatura absoluta, de la regla de gay-lussac's 1r y 2do</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Homosexuelle-Lussac's 1. Richtlinie, 
Homosexuelle-Lussac's 2. Richtlinie,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">1ère règle Gaie-Lussac's, 2ème règle 
Gaie-Lussac's,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">1a régua gay-Lussac's-Lussac's, à régua 
gay-Lussac's-Lussac's,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regola di gay-lussac's primo, regola di 
gay-lussac's secondo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Gay-Lussac 1$ος κανόνας, gay-Lussac 2$ος κανόνας,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Regla de gay-lussac's 1r, regla de 
gay-lussac's 2do,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">15-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
